title: Episode 178: Facts, Freedom & the Founding, Part 2
itunes:title: Episode 178: Facts, Freedom & the Founding, Part 2
description:
Rob McDonald returns for the second of a two-part series in which we discuss the Founding and his new book, The American Revolution.

Get Your Copy of Cooperation and Coercion Now!
